languages.text: "Вы жили вдали от чужих глаз на закрытой станции, пока Фелек не устроил диверсию?.. Так это вы — преемница новатора!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы жили вдали от чужих глаз на закрытой станции, пока Фелек не устроил диверсию?.. Так это вы — преемница новатора!"

languages.text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"
languages.original_text: "Вы жили вдали от чужих глаз на закрытой станции, пока Фелек не устроил диверсию?.. Так это вы — преемница новатора!"

traits.locale_text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"
"Wait a minute. The navigators at the stations were hesitant to let you go, and the renegades sought your demise. Surely you cannot be the Novator's successor?"
"You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"
"Wait a minute. The Navigators on the station were hesitant to let you go, and the renegades sought your demise... Surely you cannot be the Novator's successor?"
"You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"
"You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"

languages.text: “在费雷克实施破坏之前，你一直都隐居在与世隔绝的星站中，是吗？那你一定就是大族长的继承人！”
languages.original_text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"

traits.locale_text: “在费雷克实施破坏之前，你一直都隐居在与世隔绝的星站中，是吗？那你一定就是大族长的继承人！”

languages.text: «¿Vivía aislada en una estación cerrada hasta que Felek cometió su herejía? ¡Entonces debe ser la sucesora de la Novator!».
languages.original_text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Vivía aislada en una estación cerrada hasta que Felek cometió su herejía? ¡Entonces debe ser la sucesora de la Novator!».

languages.text: 「では、フェレックが破壊工作を行うまで、お前は閉鎖されたステーションで密やかに暮らしていたといいうのか？ならば、お前がノベイターの後継者に違いない！」
languages.original_text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"

traits.locale_text: 「では、フェレックが破壊工作を行うまで、お前は閉鎖されたステーションで密やかに暮らしていたといいうのか？ならば、お前がノベイターの後継者に違いない！」

languages.text: "Ihr habt abgeschieden auf einer geschlossenen Station gelegt, bis Felek seine Sabotage verübt hat? Dann müsst Ihr die Nachfolgerin des Novators sein!"
languages.original_text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt abgeschieden auf einer geschlossenen Station gelegt, bis Felek seine Sabotage verübt hat? Dann müsst Ihr die Nachfolgerin des Novators sein!"

languages.text: « Vous viviez recluse sur une station fermée jusqu'au sabotage de Felek, c'est bien ça ? C'est donc vous, la nouvelle Novator ! »
languages.original_text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous viviez recluse sur une station fermée jusqu'au sabotage de Felek, c'est bien ça ? C'est donc vous, la nouvelle Novator ! »

languages.text: "Felek sabote edene kadar dışa kapalı bir istasyonda inzivada mı yaşadın? O hâlde Rota Reisi'nin halefi sen olmalısın!"
languages.original_text: "You lived in seclusion on a closed station until Felek committed his sabotage? So then you must be the Novator's successor!"

traits.locale_text: "Felek sabote edene kadar dışa kapalı bir istasyonda inzivada mı yaşadın? O hâlde Rota Reisinin halefi sen olmalısın!"
